verses.verse: Can you <S%H4900>draw<s%> out <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> with an <S%H100>hook?<s%> or his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with a <S%H2256>cord<s%> which you <S%H8257>let<s%> <S%H8257>down?<s%>
Can you <S%H7760>put<s%> an <S%H2443>hook<s%> into his <S%H639>nose?<s%> or <S%H5344>bore<s%> his <S%H3895>jaw<s%> through with a <S%H2336>thorn?<s%>
Will he make <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8469>supplications<s%> to you? will he <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7390>soft<s%> words to you?
Will he <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you? will you <S%H3947>take<s%> him for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> for <S%H5769>ever?<s%>
Will you <S%H7832>play<s%> with him as with a <S%H6833>bird?<s%> or will you <S%H7194>bind<s%> him for your <S%H5291>maidens?<s%>
Shall the <S%H2271>companions<s%> make a <S%H3738>banquet<s%> of him? shall they <S%H2673>part<s%> him <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H3669>merchants?<s%>
Can you <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%> with <S%H7905>barbed<s%> <S%H7905>irons?<s%> or his <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H6767>spears?<s%>
<S%H7760>Lay<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> on him, <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> do <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H8431>hope<s%> of him is in <S%H3576>vain:<s%> shall not one be <S%H2904>cast<s%> <S%H2904>down<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> at the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of him?
<S%H3808>None<s%> is so <S%H393>fierce<s%> that dare <S%H5782>stir<s%> him up: <S%H4310>who<s%> then is able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me?
<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me, that I should <S%H7999>repay<s%> him? whatever is <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is mine.
I will not <S%H2790>conceal<s%> his <S%H905>parts,<s%> nor his <S%H1369>power,<s%> nor his <S%H2433>comely<s%> <S%H6187>proportion.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H1540>discover<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3830>garment?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> to him with his <S%H3718>double<s%> <S%H7448>bridle?<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of his <S%H6440>face?<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H367>terrible<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.
His <S%H650>scales<s%> <S%H4043><s%> are his <S%H1346>pride,<s%> <S%H5462>shut<s%> up together as with a <S%H6862>close<s%> <S%H2368>seal.<s%>
<S%H259>One<s%> is so <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>air<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them.
They are <S%H1692>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> they <S%H3920>stick<s%> together, that they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H6504>sundered.<s%>
By his <S%H5846>neesings<s%> a <S%H216>light<s%> does <S%H1984>shine,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning.<s%>
Out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H3940>burning<s%> <S%H3940>lamps,<s%> and <S%H3590>sparks<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4422>leap<s%> out.
Out of his <S%H5156>nostrils<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> as out of a <S%H5301>seething<s%> <S%H1731>pot<s%> or <S%H100>caldron.<s%>
His <S%H5315>breath<s%> <S%H3857>kindles<s%> <S%H1513>coals,<s%> and a <S%H3851>flame<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
In his <S%H6677>neck<s%> <S%H3885>remains<s%> <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and <S%H1670>sorrow<s%> is <S%H1750>turned<s%> into joy <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
The <S%H4651>flakes<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> are <S%H1692>joined<s%> together: they are <S%H3332>firm<s%> in themselves; they <S%H1077>cannot<s%> be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H3332>firm<s%> as a <S%H68>stone;<s%> yes, as <S%H3332>hard<s%> as a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of the <S%H8482>nether<s%> millstone.
When he <S%H7613>raises<s%> up himself, the <S%H410>mighty<s%> are <S%H1481>afraid:<s%> by reason of <S%H7667>breakings<s%> they <S%H2398>purify<s%> themselves.
The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of him that <S%H5381>lays<s%> at him <S%H1097>cannot<s%> <S%H6965>hold:<s%> the <S%H2595>spear,<s%> the <S%H4551>dart,<s%> nor the <S%H8302>habergeon.<s%>
He <S%H2803>esteems<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> as <S%H8401>straw,<s%> and <S%H5154>brass<s%> as <S%H7539>rotten<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
The <S%H1121>arrow<s%> <S%H7198><s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> make him <S%H1272>flee:<s%> sling <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H7050><s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> with him into <S%H7179>stubble.<s%>
<S%H8455>Darts<s%> are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble:<s%> he <S%H7832>laughs<s%> at the <S%H7494>shaking<s%> of a <S%H3591>spear.<s%>
<S%H2303>Sharp<s%> <S%H2789>stones<s%> are <S%H8478>under<s%> him: he <S%H7502>spreads<s%> <S%H2742>sharp<s%> <S%H2742>pointed<s%> things on the <S%H2916>mire.<s%>
He makes the <S%H4688>deep<s%> to <S%H7570>boil<s%> like a <S%H5518>pot:<s%> he <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> like a pot of <S%H4841>ointment.<s%>
He makes a <S%H5410>path<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him; one would <S%H2803>think<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> to be <S%H7872>hoary.<s%>
On <S%H6083>earth<s%> there is not his <S%H4915>like,<s%> who is <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2844>fear.<s%>
He <S%H7200>beholds<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> things: he is a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7830>pride.<s%>
